what is waste management?: Waste management is the process of collecting, transporting, and disposing of waste in a safe and environmentally friendly way.
how do i report a full bin?: You can use the /report command or contact your local authority.
where is bin 12?: Bin 12 is located near Block C, next to the community center.
what are the rules for waste disposal?: Sort waste into recyclables and non-recyclables. Never dump hazardous materials in regular bins.
